name: Conduction Crisis
description:
This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2018. 

Your space station is being hit by asteroids! The core that powers the shield is in danger of overheating and you must manage the heat sinks efficiently to keep the shield up and allow people to escape.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look
  • Left click: Interact / Pick up
  • Hold right click: Destroy heat sink (while holding)
  • Left shift: Sprint

Check out our Global Game Jam page here!: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/conduction-crisis

Credits: 

  • Sydney Wontor - SFX / Designer
  • Zac Singer - Programmer / Designer
  • Aidan Bauer - Programmer / Designer

  • Ron M Burgess - Artist / Designer / Programmer
  • Special Thanks to Dave Tomzcyk
